ch0148_40_matsuba/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Are you ready for
the Midnight Parade?
ch0148_40_matsuba/0101_0701_02_10:
I hope you’re ready to have fun tonight. It’s going
to be a blast!
ch0148_40_matsuba/7101_0701_01_10: Hey there. I was just passing out some candy.
ch0148_40_matsuba/7101_0701_02_10:
Supposedly, anyone who unwraps one of these
Mimikyu candies will become frozen with fright!
ch0148_40_matsuba/7101_0701_03_10: Hahaha! I’m just messing around with you.
ch0148_40_matsuba/7102_0701_01_10:
How does this costume look on me? I’m dressed up
as a guide for the Midnight Parade.
ch0148_40_matsuba/7102_0701_02_10:
Banette also seems happy to welcome you to
the party!
ch0148_40_matsuba/7102_0701_03_10:
I think he wants you to join us... But be careful!
You never know what tricks he might play!
ch0148_40_matsuba/7103_0701_01_10:
I’ve spent a lot of time around Ghost-type
Pokémon, so they don’t scare me all that much.
ch0148_40_matsuba/7103_0701_02_10:
When I see others get scared out of their wits by
ghosts, I kinda wish I could experience that, too.
ch0148_40_matsuba/7103_0701_03_10:
Maybe, when I least expect it, you'll find a way
to surprise me!
ch0148_40_matsuba/7104_0701_01_10:
I’ve heard that Pumpkaboo dolls sell really well at
certain times of year.
ch0148_40_matsuba/7104_0701_02_10:
And they come in all sorts of sizes! From small
ones you can sit on your lap to big ones you can
use as a body pillow!
ch0148_40_matsuba/7104_0701_03_10:
I wonder what size would be right for you. Maybe
you should check out what the shops have!
ch0148_40_matsuba/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I love the
costume you’re wearing today!
ch0148_40_matsuba/7105_0701_02_10:
That white hand on your shoulder looks so realistic!
You did a great job on that!
ch0148_40_matsuba/7105_0701_03_10: Hm? Why’d your face suddenly get so pale?
ch0148_40_matsuba/1701_0701_01_10:
Are you enjoying the night? I’ve got a present
for you.
ch0148_40_matsuba/1701_0702_01_10:
I really hope you like it. If it makes you happy—
even a little bit—that makes me feel great, too!
ch0148_40_matsuba/2501_0701_01_10:
I haven’t let my guard down just because there’s
a fun event going on.
ch0148_40_matsuba/2501_0701_02_10: I’m always ready to battle—even now!
ch0148_40_matsuba/2501_0701_03_10:
I’m down to be your practice partner if you want
to check how strong you’ve become.
ch0148_40_matsuba/2501_0702_01_10: Banette and I are more pumped up than usual!
ch0148_40_matsuba/2501_0702_02_10:
In battle, I’ll show you the true meaning of fear!
Get ready for a night of frightful apparitions!
ch0148_40_matsuba/2501_0702_03_10: I have to go all out, otherwise I can’t beat you!
ch0148_40_matsuba/2511_0701_01_10:
Some folks believe Banette are abandoned dolls
that sprung into being over their grudges from
being junked.
ch0148_40_matsuba/2511_0701_02_10:
They say every Banette is still looking for the child
who threw it away.
ch0148_40_matsuba/2511_0701_03_10:
Have you ever lost a doll? If so...you might want
to watch your back! *chuckle*
ch0148_40_matsuba/2511_0702_01_10:
I personally don’t think Banette exist because of
a grudge.
ch0148_40_matsuba/2511_0702_02_10: I think they just want to be loved.
ch0148_40_matsuba/3001_0701_01_10:
I’ve been thinking of some spooky ways to surprise
people! I can’t wait till nighttime to try them out!
ch0148_40_matsuba/3003_0701_01_10:
Hey, do you want some candy? I have plenty of
treats for your Pokémon, too.
ch0148_40_matsuba/3005_0701_01_10:
Let’s light up some jack-o’-lanterns and enjoy
the night!
